attributes.action: ban the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
fireworks are bombs yet they are sold to anyone who has the money to purchase them ,
they kill and maim ,they terrify millions of animals ,they cause disruption and worry to may thousands of people but they are still sold  and set off for weeks on end .
the safe and sensible course of action would be to make a law that prohibits the sale of fireworks and makes sure that fireworks are only available to organisations who will hold displays in a safe and monitored event that takes place  on the night that they were intended for, the 5th of November

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
